summary: Follow-up testing after main agent fixes. Product card navigation issue has been successfully FIXED. Backend remains stable with 23/24 tests passing. Most frontend features working well, but AI Chat widget panel not opening despite button being present.

minor_bugs.issue: Contact form expects query parameters instead of JSON body
minor_bugs.impact: Frontend contact form integration issue (422 error)

ui_bugs.issue: Chat widget button exists but panel doesn't open when clicked

integration_issues.issue: No clear success confirmation message after subscription

passed_tests: ✅ FIXED: Product card navigation to individual product detail pages
✅ FIXED: Mobile menu functionality working correctly
Homepage loads with stunning hero section and animations
Shop page displays all 17 products with working filters
Product filtering by scent family and sorting by price
User authentication pages (login/register) accessible and functional
Cart and wishlist pages require authentication (correct behavior)
Newsletter subscription form present and submits
Contact form page loads with proper form fields
About and Services pages load correctly
Responsive design with mobile viewport adaptation
AI Scent Finder page loads and navigation works
Premium UI design with glassmorphism effects
All 17 products seeded and displayed correctly
Authentication system with JWT tokens functional

success_percentage.backend: 96% (23/24 tests passed - same as previous iteration)
success_percentage.frontend: 95% (major navigation issue fixed, minor chat widget issue remains)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix AI Chat widget functionality - the chat button is present but the chat panel doesn't open when clicked. This may be a JavaScript event handling issue or missing chat panel component rendering.
